name: Ultimate PopUnder
author: Cris Griffith

sections.description:
Generate a flexible PopUnder AD on your WordPress site using the lalund.js logic. This allows you to use several URLs as rotating test logic for the links. This plugin creates a custom post type to add your links along with weighting and logic. You can edit global details about the functionality under the default settings menu.

Special Features

You can track the data from the PopUnder activity in 3rd party systems:

  • Google Analytics
    • dataLayer.push event
  • Google Tag Manager
    • Univeral Analytics event
sections.installation: Install the plugin and then edit the settings under the default WordPress Settings menu.
sections.changelog:
1.2.5

  • Added ability to restrict popunder to the user’s state:
    • everyone
    • not logged in (guest)
    • logged in (member)

1.2.4

  • Fix Content Closure

1.2.3

  • Verify WP 4.8.2
  • Fix additional content additions of JS tags

1.1.3

  • Fix JS error on Woocommerce @single and @shop

1.1.2

  • Bump to support 4.8

1.1.1

  • Fix security issue of POST data
  • Add Google Analytics

short_description: Add PopUnder links to your WordPress site and also track these events in your external marketing tools.

upgrade_notice: You should upgrade this plugin to obtain new features released.
